tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I had Mr. Phillips for World Religions online, and he was a wonderful teacher! He updated regularly, left great feedback, and made the class fun and a positive learning environment. I will gladly take another one of his classes!

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Professor Phillips seems to be curious about life and it shows in his teaching. I felt curious along with him

comments: He was really fun to learn from. He is interested in the play between student and teacher. I\'d love to take more classes from him

Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Jeremy Phillips was by far the coolest teacher I\'ve ever had. He had us watch movies that had to do with the religion we were studying at the time and took us on field trips to places of worship of the religions we were studying. Best class I\'ve ever taken, best teacher I\'ve ever had. Hands down.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I had Mr. Phillips for Eastern Religions. He was a good teacher, who knew much about the subject. He was nice and taught in an understandable manner. He was, however a bit conventional and.... well, dull. His class was an hour and 20 minute class, though, and that may have contributed to the bore factor.
